profile:
Ambia Windows and Doors has established itself as a premier provider of quality windows and doors that combine innovative design with superb construction. Our extensive knowledge is your guarantee that you’re getting the best product and service.Custom and specialty work is our expertise. Our many satisfied customers recognize our product lines for their design excellence, traditional craftsmanship, sophisticated technology and product integrity. You'll find our windows and doors in homes that range from simple to superb, throughout the GTA and surrounding areas. And, homeowners are sure to enjoy the comfort our varied line of window and door collections – even on the warmest or coldest day.

*****

Our sales and installation team can accommodate all your needs, efficiently and effectively, while our superior standards and lifetime warranties apply to everyone. Because we work closely with our manufacturer, you can be sure your project will be completed on-time and on-budget.This commitment to service enables us to establish long-term relationship with all our valued customers. When it comes to Service, we never compromise.

profile: 'IN THE END, SERVICE WINS!' High Quality Wrought Iron & Stained Glass Door Inserts - Toronto GTA Area. A door says a lot about a home and at What A Pane, we want to make sure that the first impression your guests have of your home is a lasting one. We are one of the few door insert companies in the GTA that have an actual business premises and a fully stocked showroom. We help to add sophistication, personality and eye-catching details to your home’s front door. From stained glass to wrought iron work, What A Pane offers the best value in the GTA. Our family operated business, established in 1998, is known for providing quality, reliable services and competitive prices. With our design experts, What A Pane continues to the number one choice for beautiful door inserts that Toronto residents love to display in their home. We offer a variety of patterns, textures and designs, so you will have plenty of choice when choosing which door glass suits your home the best. Call or email us now - we answer promptly! Whatsapp, email, text hotline 416 436-8208 We collect and store used decorative glass and donate to Habitat For Humanity. :-) We're social here: https://www.pinterest.ca/whatapanedesign/what-a-pane-door-inserts/ https://www.facebook.com/whatapanedesign/ hyyps://www,pinterest.com/whatapanedesign/
service_area:
Whole of GTA and central Ontario.
From Niagara to Barrie to Peterborough.
For all areas Call TOLL FREE 1-888 401-PANE(7263)

profile: Windows, Doors, Porch Enclosures... TOTAL HOME WINDOWS and DOORS is a Toronto based renovating and home improvement company that has a proven reputation for its high quality windows and doors installation and great customer service. We at Total Home Window and Doors are proud of the products and services that we provide to our customers. We offer the BEST CHOICES from the BEST MANUFACTURERS that use innovative technology and design. Our pedantry, responsibility and strive toward absolute order and tight control in each stage of work are a warranty of our clients' absolute satisfaction. Quality and Comfort Have Never Been So Affordable! Total Home Windows and Doors are fully qualified for the Greener Home Rebate program. The Canada Greener Homes Grant will help homeowners make their homes more energy-efficient and fight climate change. Check out the website below for more information and to find out how you can qualify: https://www.nrcan.gc.ca/energy-efficiency/homes/canada-greener-homes-grant/23441 Our mission, at Total Home Windows and Doors is to help you make the best possible choice for saving energy while establishing comfort and elegance that will compliment any interior and exterior. We guarantee the quality and durability in the products we sell and install and offer a lifetime no limitation manufacturer warranty on all our windows and doors. We meet all specific customers needs with affordable rates and find most suitable promotional deals. All the products we provide will be installed by our professional team fast & hassle free. All of our products are fully guaranteed, with an industry leading warranty. Total Home Windows Doors

profile:
Welcome to Lusso Design's Homestars Page

We specialize in design, manufacturing & installation of top quality fiberglass & steel  entry door systems. With over  15 years of experience in door manufacturing we use door components by Novatech as well as MasterGrain, which are the two of most prominent Canadian door & door component manufacturers. Our doors are assembled & installed with great care to make sure that You get a product of unrivaled quality & appearance. 

We use custom manufactured wrought iron & lasercut steel door inserts  to add true individuality to Your door, making sure, that Your door will look like no other.

Currently we're developing a system of custom designed aluminum & glass railing that will match our doors & infinitely increase the curb appeal of Your house.  

Visit Us in our beautiful showroom in Richmond Hill & see it Yourself.

For latest & greatest in the world of custom doors & door inserts follow 
Us on Instagram @lussodesigncanada

SPECIALIZING IN WROUGHT IRON AND DECORATIVE GLASS DOOR INSERTS


Distinctive Glass Inserts Ontario's Largest Installers Of high quality Decorative and Wrought Iron Glass Door Inserts. We carry the largest, most extensive selection of Glass Door inserts at the best prices and provide guaranteed professional installation.


What makes Distinctive Glass inserts different is that we are a full time family run company,  and we are committed to helping consumers make an educated decision, and feel confident In The Wrought Iron Or Decorative Glass Door Insert That They Choose. We provide a 10 year warranty on All Of Our Glass Door Inserts, and will replace your Glass Insert promptly if there are any problems. .Buyer Beware your warranty is not valid if the individual is not selling glass  a year from now. Your Warranty will Be gone the minute they leave the premises. Often times people call us to repair or replace defective glass Inserts, because they are unable to Find the original installer. We hear often that people have tried to get in contact with the company that installed the glass but are told they are no longer in business and no where to be found.

Your front entrance is the first thing people see, give us a call and get it done right the first time.



They say first impressions are everything, the same goes for your home. Your front door is the first thing your guests will see. Our Wrought Iron & Decorative Glass door inserts create that everlasting first impression. Our designs are timeless and we are sure you will find a style that will match your beautiful home.

profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

------ ATTENTION ! ------ Before you purchase your next windows give me a call. My name is Paul and I work at the factory! --------
55% of window contractors purchase windows at our factory. ------- SKIP The MIDDLEMAN and Save 35% on any Window and Door purchase and installation. -------
1.	I have been working at a Windows and Doors factory here in Toronto for over 19 years. --------
2.	I have a great relationship with my boss, and I can buy any windows or doors at manufacturing cost. --------
3.	I personally do all of the measuring, ordering as well as installation. ---------
4.	Once your windows are ordered I fully oversee the exact manufacturing process to makes sure that every window is custom made. ---------
5.	I have no staff, no fancy office and no overhead. I will show you the factory invoice so that you know you are not paying a single dollar over the manufacturing cost. My Competition will never do that! ---------
6.	I offer lifetime warranty. Any window that goes bad will be replaced with a brand new one! --------

------ All of my estimates are absolutely free.  ---- I do House Window Installations ----- I do Office Window Installations ----- I do Industrial Window Installations ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------ I Provide Toronto Window and Door Installations -------  Scarborough Window and Door Installations ------- Etobicoke Window and Door Installations ------- North York Window and Door Installations ------- Mississauga Window and Door Installations ------- Brampton Window and Door Installations ------- Oakville Window and Door Installations ------- Burlington Window and Door Installations ------- Hamilton Window and Door Installations ------- St Catharines Window and Door Installations ------- Niagara Falls Window and Door Installations ------- Vaughan Window and Door Installations ------- Richmond Hill Window and Door Installations ------- Markham Window and Door Installations ------- Aurora Window and Door Installations ------- Newmarket Window and Door Installations ------- Stouffville Window and Door Installations ------- Pickering Window and Door Installations ------- Ajax Window and Door Installations ------- Whitby Window and Door Installations ------- Oshawa Window and Door Installations 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WindowRama by Paul is a family run business and if you call us we will treat you like family from the first time we meet to a final handshake and the job well done. Plus we stand behind our Windows and Doors as well as all of our craftsmanship a 100% that is why we offer a Life Time Transferable Warranty. 


I am small local business just trying to provide for my family, the quality of my work means everything to me. Give me a chance to work for you and you will be a very Satisfied Customer.

profile:
www.encorewindows.com and www.bquiet.ca and Encore Windows and Encore Windows & Doors
In business since 1987, we specialize in the highest quality energy efficient window and door replacements. We guarantee you will know which windows and doors are best for you, and why before you buy. No high pressure salespeople. We provide exclusive designed windows and doors with all options of color, styles, finishes, shapes, glass, treatments, wood, vinyl and metal and metal clad. We are exclusive dealers for Soundproof windows. If you have a window or door problem we have the right solution for you. We Guarantee our delivery time for most products and once started we stay until the job is complete. Our entire staff is 100% trained and committed to provide you with the highest level of service and satisfaction. The highest level of care is taken to ensure your window and door project is completely stress free. The utmost care is taken while working in your home. You will be completely informed and in control during every step of your installation from the selection process right to the final moment of your project. 
 
Encore Windows & Doors is a well established window and door company and an Energy Star company, committed to providing the most efficient products available. Our mission is to continually raise the standard of a window and door company. Encore Windows guarantees that you’ll receive the finest quality windows in Canada. We are authorized dealers for CSA Certified windows. Your windows are guaranteed to be installed properly by Window Wise Certified installers. Feel secure your investment is unconditionally protected. We give you a complete lifetime warranty on parts and labor. We promise you will know which windows are best for you and why, before you buy. No pressure – we employ certified professionals. Our aim is to be much more than a normal window and door company. Our windows and doors are built with you in mind. The same applies to the way we work.

profile:
Centennial Windows & Doors is a family owned and operated business that offers an end-to-end solution for replacement windows and doors. We sell, manufacture, install, and service our own complete line of award winning, energy efficient windows and doors.
 
Why homeowners choose Centennial Windows & Doors
 
The Best Warranty
- We provide a 100% warranty on everything we do for as long as you own your home – NO fine print and NO exclusions. And if you sell your home, it's transferable to new homeowners within 10 years of purchasing Centennial windows and doors.
 
Responsibility and Accountability
- We take full responsibility to manufacture, install, and service your windows and doors. You are dealing with ONE company only and one phone number. 
 
Proven Installation Quality
- We DO NOT hire subcontractors. All work is performed by our full time, uniformed employees, fully covered under Workers’ Compensation. Centennial Installers were the first in Canada to write the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) Fenestration Installation Technician (FIT) certification exam.
 
Leaders in Energy Efficiency
- Centennial Windows & Doors was the first window company in Canada to be ENERGY STAR® certified. We have been awarded the:
          - 2004 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award
          - 2005 – ENERGY STAR Retailer of the Year Award
          - 2008 – ENERGY STAR Sustained Excellence Award
          - 2014 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award – Windows and Doors
- Since 2013, our windows have been recognized as ENERGY STAR Most Efficient.

profile:
WELDA Windows and Doors where Quality Doesn`t Cost - It Pays! ----WELDA Windows and Doors - Ontario’s Home Improvement Company installs Energy Star vinyl windows, residential entry doors and patio / porch / entrance enclosures to fit any home in Toronto, GTA, Ontario. If you`re planing to upgrade your windows, doors or porch enclosure and price, quality, and service are important - you need to contact WELDA Windows and Doors.--- www. weldawindows.com --- www.ontariowindowsanddoors.ca--- We also supply and install window coverings and retractable awnings. 

Please visit www.weldashading.com---

***

Whether your preference is for basic sliding windows and steel entry doors or your taste is more for casement windows and fiberglass doors,  WELDA Windows & Doors home improvement company has the solution for you.  Replacement vinyl windows in Toronto; front entrance doors in Toronto, GTA, Barrie; energy star windows in Toronto, Brampton; porch enclosures in Oakville, Oshawa;  sliding patio doors in Kitchener, Burlington, Ajax.


***

WELDA Windows and Doors offers a full line of vinyl replacement windows, residential entry doors, porch enclosures and window coverings to enhance the architectural style of any home in the Greater Toronto Area.

***

Investing in new windows and doors should be a one-time investment, so we make every effort to provide our customers with the education and understanding they need to make an informed buying decision.

***

At WELDA Windows, our approach is different. First of all, rather than "sell" you anything, we help you "buy" windows and doors by listening to your needs and then matching those needs with the right product and installation to meet those needs. Homeowners who make "informed buying decisions" based upon having all their needs met and understanding what they are purchasing are the most satisfied customers.

***

Our consultants are very skilled at walking you through the buying process, listening to your needs and concerns, explaining the features and benefits of each product and installation and arriving at the best choice to fill your needs. They can even explain the many financing options that are available to help you get the products you want, when you want them. After choices are made, our consultants can explain the installation process. Our custom installation methods and techniques assure a neat, clean, efficient installation in your home. WELDA stands behind its work like no other home improvement company. 

***

Our products & services include:
*Energy Efficient Windows & Doors, CSA Rated, Energy Star
*Single & Double Slider Window
*Awning Window
*Single & Double Hung Window
*Casement Window
*Picture Window
*Bay Windows
*Bow Windows
*Steel Entrance Door
*Fiberglass Entry Door
*Garden Hinged Door
*Exterior Sliding Patio Door
*Windows & Doors Installation
*Porch Enclosures
*Window Coverings
*Custom Interior Shutters

***

See full details of all our products on our website: www.weldawindows.com and www.ontariowindowsanddoors.ca

profile:
Established in 1988, Torwin has become a trusted source for all of your external home renovation needs. With over 75 years of combined experience, we are industry leaders specializing in window and door product services and installations. We pride ourselves on quality and craftsmanship.
With humble beginnings, we began with window and door system sales. Over the years we have grown to expand our product and service offering to include: brick and frame knockouts, custom wood work, moldings, shutters (interior and exterior), siding, eavestrough, fascia, hardware, custom glass work, architectural décor and sealed unit repair. 
From an extensive showroom to our own in-house installation crews, we have grown over the years in response to the demand for the “Torwin Touch,” a way of doing business putting the customer first.  We develop relationships and truly believe that our work is a reflection of our name.
Privately owned and operated, our hands-on experience allows us to make you comfortable in your decision process.

profile: EcoTech Windows & Doors has been installing energy efficient windows and doors for Ontario homeowners since 2001.  If you are ready to replace your home's windows and doors, you have found the right company.  We offer a superior product manufactured and installed to perfection at a great price.  We strive for 100% customer satisfaction ensuring our customers are happy with their order while having access to great customer service throughout the sales and installation process.  Our product line is designed to withstand Canadian climates, leaving you secure, protected and warm through the harshest winter days but cool and relaxed during the summer heat. We offer a wide selection of vinyl window styles including casement windows, awning windows, single hung and double hung windows, single slider tilt and double slider tilt windows, bay and bow windows and more. In addition to our full line of energy efficient vinyl windows, we also offer a wide selection of beautiful exterior doors in various designs and colours.  Make your home energy efficient and instantly improve your curb appeal with EcoTech Windows and Doors.  Call 1-888-901-7276 for a free in-home estimate today!

profile:
At Comfort Windows & Doors we supply and install quality energy-efficient windows and doors.
***
Comfort Windows & Doors will fully address all of your installation priorities. We offer you many choices of Window and Door Products to meet all of your individual style, comfort, and budget needs.
***
We offer expert consultation and installation. Our Professional and Certified Teams of Consultants and installers are geared to make your installation experience an informed and pleasant choice. We are one of the most reputable window contractors, serving the GTA, Halton, Peel, and York Regions including Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham and surrounding municipalities.
***
Our post-installation inspection by one of our qualified project supervisors will further ensure the industry’s top standards. We carry a solid product and installation warranty, unmatched by most window companies and independent installers. Furthermore; all of our window and door installers are WSIB insured.
***
We would be proud to guide you through a well scheduled, careful and orderly installation from start to finish. We are fully bonded and insured.
***
We accept Visa/Mastercard/Debit/Cheque and Cash

No commission salespeople, Deal directly with the owner

profile:
Welcome to AMICA Windows and Doors Inc.
#1 Choice for Homeowners, Renovators, Architects and Builders!
  
We supply and install windows/ doors in Toronto and the GTA!

Honest, non-pushy, helpful and extremely knowledgeable with regards to every aspect including design/colour and style. All of our estimates are provided in black and white with all the details of the project outlined and our estimates and design consultations are FREE!

We offer a range of interior and exterior options for Windows and Doors. All our products are built locally to meet and exceed all Canadian norms and quality standards and are backed by industry leading truly worry free guarantees. Our services include:

Windows Installations
Entrance Door Installations
Garden Door Installations
Patio Door Installations
Bi-Fold Door installations.

Our quality and service are second to none, which is why we provide a full satisfaction guarantee. If you are looking for the best door installation services, then please complete our quick online form with all the details of your needs, upon which our Sales Consultants will contact you to arrange a time to visit you in the comfort of your own home. On-site measuring and advice can be offered while viewing your unique project requirements.

For over 15 years we have successfully installed windows and doors for thousands of customers all across Toronto and the GTA area.

This includes cities such as Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, North York, Etobicoke, Scarborough, Malton, Richmond Hill, Leslieville, Woodbridge, Maple, Whitby, Pickering, Oakville, Markham, Ajax, Oshawa, East York, Beaches and New Market, Ontario.
Visit us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram

profile:
Vista One Retractable Screens supplies and installs the most innovative retractable screens for doors and windows. We have several models to choose from, those that Rollaway, and others that Foldaway. They all retract into a compact cassette when not in use. Our screens provide the best protection against flying insects while providing ventilation to your home.

There are four main components to Retractable Screens, whether they Rollaway or Foldaway - Housing, Mesh, Pull Rail/Slide Bar, Guide rails. 

Traditional fixed screens have limitations: they are unattractive, obstruct the view within and without; prone to damage; difficult to maneuver; hard to clean.

A retractable screen from Vista One is durable, safe and easy to operate. With our extensive line of screens to choose from we have a screen to compliment any home design. Our custom screens provide a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living spaces, blending the best of both worlds!
products: Retractable screens, retractable screens for door, retractable screens for windows, and retractable screens for large openings.
services: We provide the supply, and installation of retractable screens. We have a host of colours that will match most any decor.
brands: Vista One brands include our Rollaway Series screens and our Foldaway Series.
specialities: Vista One provides retractable screen solutions for all types and sizes of openings.
warranty_terms: Manufacturers Limited Lifetime on Product, 2 Years on Labour.

At Dekorum, we know how important your home is to you. That’s why you can trust our professional team to listen to your ideas and understand your vision in order to make your home remodeling dreams a reality. Our team of residential and commercial experts offers superior quality general contracting service. With years of experience in the industry, we know how to get the job done right.

*****

With over 15 years of experience, the Dekorum team has built a solid reputation with our clients. We work closely with you throughout the renovation process, and our commitment to your satisfaction is what makes us one of the leading home renovation services in the Toronto area.

*****

What Makes Us Unique?

*****

Our contractors work on both big and small projects and are always ready to assist you, no matter you are renovating a small room or an entire home or business space. Minimal disruption to your home. No hassles as we manage everything. Locally-owned & operated in Toronto. We are committed to customer service.

profile:
Window Depot
 
Are you remodeling, or upgrading your home for energy efficiency and improving the aesthetics of your property? Whether you are looking to do this to keep your cost down or making your property more attractive for resale, we can do this for you and here's how.
We manufacture our windows on site and use the best German made equipment for vinyl fabrication in combination with the highest quality US and Canadian raw materials in the making of our products. This means you will receive the finest grade of window product available. We also have skilled installers who possess the critical expertise in making the transformation as least intrusive and in a timely manner. Over nine years of servicing GTA community along with our fair price points have been the key to our ongoing success which we take great pride in.
Think of us as your trusted advisor when it comes to design and guiding you towards the best possible outcome for your door and window installation.  We really do believe windows can be art as well as a necessity for your home.
 
Call us today to see what is possible.

Euro Choice Windows & Doors was founded in 1998. Our company specializes in the manufacturing and installation of European style and design windows and doors, energy efficient UPVC vinyl windows, sliding doors, steel entrance doors and fibreglass doors. All Euro Choice Windows & Doors products are built to strict specifications and are regularly inspected for operation and craftsmanship. All our staff is professional and courteous with many years of experience. Since we do not use sub-contractors we have a reputation for consistency and quality. This reputation took nearly 20 years to build and we are proud to see our windows and doors in your home.

profile:
Phantom Screens/ Ontario Screen Systems offers a beautiful alternative to traditional insect screens. Manufactured in Canada, Phantom retractable screens disappear when not in use and come in a variety of colours to match virtually any décor, all while blending in perfectly with door trim to maintaining the home’s architectural integrity. 

These screens can be cover all window types including casement, awning, single & double-hung, sliding and tilt ‘n’turn windows.

They are also customized for double french doors, swing in swing out doors, sliding doors, and oversized doors.

Motorized retractable screens by Phantom provide insect protection, climate control and solar shading without blocking your views.

Visit https://phantomscreens.ca/ and talk to a Screen Expert today.
products: All of Phantom Screens, including retractable screen doors, windows and motorized screens
services: Our trained installation technicians and the Limited Lifetime Warranty ensure that Phantom Screens last a lifetime.
specialities:
Once you've made contact with us at Ontario Screen Systems Inc., we will talk to you about your requirements and ideas you have. We’ll then take detailed measurements and prepare you an estimate. We'll also schedule an installation date with you.

Depending on how many doors and window screens you order, most installations are completed within one day. However, before we schedule an installation with you we will take into account any manufacturing lead times when ordering your screens. There are a number of installation options for our large opening (manual and motorized) screens including fully recessed and surface mounted and so the time taken for installation will vary for every project.

Our door and window screens, as well as our screens for large openings are professionally installed by Phantom-trained installers who will treat your home with care.

Call us today and experience Phantom Screens.

profile:
Notice: During the COVID-19 pandemic, Window Experts is operational during this time for all your needs. We are able to provide quotations and estimates through the practice of social distancing and safety measures. Call us today for a free quote at 416-844-0099!
  
 
The Window Experts is a Canadian company that has been installing Canadian-made, high-quality windows and doors, for over 15 years. We are committed to providing exceptional service to help transform your dream home into a reality, starting with your windows and doors.

The majority of our business is based on referrals from our satisfied customers, therefore, we work with integrity and want to be your number one choice for doors’ and windows’ replacements!

Our Services:
1) Installation services for builders and contractors:
We supply and install windows and doors from Window Wise certified manufacturers.

2) Installation services for windows and doors companies and manufacturers:
Windows and doors companies and manufacturers face several points of pressure. You need to cater to the volume of requests received as well as meet deadlines that might often be unreasonable.
In such situations, a reliable contractor, who can take the responsibility of professional installations off your hand, can be a blessing. At Window Experts, we realize that and we will be happy to assist you with any and all types of window-installations, including:

Brick to Brick installation (Vinyl Windows/Aluminum Windows)
Retrofit/Frame to Frame installation (Vinyl Windows)
Bay to build/Bow to build (with roof/with skirt)
Sliding Doors (any type of standard/custom)
Entrance Doors (Steel/Vinyl/Wood/Fiberglass)
Garden Doors (Steel/Vinyl/Wood/Fiberglass)

3) Inspection services:
The need to conduct regular window inspections has been, increasingly, receiving the recognition it deserves. Be it commissioned by regulatory authorities, builders/ contractors, or requested by homeowners themselves, inspections offer a window of opportunity to identify issues before they occur. The issues, in turn, might result in a loss of finances, time or health.

Take, for instance, the case of humidity. Condensation and frost that collect on the surface of poor quality windows can permeate and create moisture, inside homes. This will, in turn, have ramifications on inhabitants’ lung health, in the long run.

This is why, inspecting windows before purchasing them or signing with a contractor, is strongly recommended. Windows Experts offer independent inspection services for companies and clients who had already replaced their windows or doors, but have questions or concerns.

profile:
Exterior Doors & Windows from Olympia Town Aluminum
Exterior door
Serving Scarborough and the Area Since 1981
Install new windows and doors with Olympia Town Aluminum. We sell, install and repair exterior doors and windows. You can find everything from patio and storm doors to vinyl windows and bungalow eavestroughs.

Located in Scarborough, we’ve been serving the area for 31 years now. Our reputation for cleanliness and quality workmanship provides us with many referrals and repeat business. We’re professional and treat every home like our own.

The Benefits of New Exterior Windows & Doors
If you find your heating and cooling bills are too high, the solution could be the installation of new exterior windows and doors. Your old windows or doors may have let heat escape in the winter and allowed cool air to filter out during the summer. This forces you to run your heating and cooling units longer and more often. Consider new windows and doors and save on your energy bill.

Make an appointment for your window or door installation today.

profile:
Windows & Doors Ontario is a leading supplier and installer of quality windows and doors. Windows & Doors Ontario have been supplying and installing energy efficient windows, entry doors and garage doors for Ontario homeowners since 2001.
Our company manufactures and sells our product here in Canada specifically within the communities that have given us their support from the very beginning. We keep our manufacturing local and make sure that we employ experienced and expert artisans within our own area.
The focus of our designs is not just to spruce up your home from the outside. It is important that we create products that are functional and practical so that our customers could save money while ensuring our environment-friendly processes. We use energy-saving materials as well as construction methods such as our LOE-180 or 272 glass for premium insulation. Our priority is also to reduce carbon footprint and waste from our installation and constructing processes. We make sure you find no difficulties in removing and disposing your old doors and windows.
Experience convenience and hassle-free transactions with us from our free in-home estimates to our Ontario clients. We guarantee that our estimates have no hidden or additional costs at all. Our team takes pride in our installation process because our methods are tailored to cater to your schedule. You can trust our team of experts to provide accurate and detailed timelines while ensuring 100% satisfaction from you.
Contact Windows & Doors Ontario today to schedule your in-home estimate for free. Our knowledgeable and experienced representative will get in touch with you and assist you throughout the process. Update and boost your home and building with us to create a better community!

profile:
SMART CHOICE – WINDOW AND DOOR SYSTEM INC. We are one of the leading suppliers and installers of windows and doors in Toronto, that are specially made to save energy. Our large inventory includes every conceivable window and door styles that you can imagine, from sliders and casements to European style tilt and turns and picture windows to elegant patio doors to well-secured entry doors, complemented by a range of colors and maintenance free interior options.
***
Our Windows and Doors are built to the highest industry specifications and all our window frames and sashes are fusion-welded in the factory, for that robust strength, with a lifetime factory processed seal for air and water leakage.
***
Smart Choice window and door panes are manufactured with double seal insulating glasses with multi-point locking systems on the casement for greater security, convenient operation, cool style, and durability. Our manufacturing environment is 100% lead-free, and PVC safe manufacturing process.
***
Any new windows and doors can bring up the value of your home considerably, more so with Smart Choice Window and Door System as they are crafted by homeowners like you with infinite care and well attentions to details, built using the finest materials with the most current technology. We guarantee your investment with the industry-leading warrant.

***

Call us today for an estimate.

profile:
Khali Windows & Doors provide professional windows and doors installation services for homeowners all around Greater Toronto Area.
With quality replacement of Vinyl Windows, French Doors, Storm Doors, Sliding Vinyl Patio Doors, Fiberglass Entry Doors, Steel Entry Doors and most modern types of Windows.
Our energy-efficient vinyl windows are made from 100% lead-free uPVC for improved resistance to impact and discoloration. In addition to being maintenance-free, they feature a unique multi-chamber construction that maximizes insulation, thermal efficiency and sturdiness.
Whether for new construction or replacement projects, we customize every window to the specific needs of the buyer, down to the finest detail.

Khali Windows & Doors
Contact us today for a free consultation on windows and doors.

profile:
Simpson Windows & Doors

***

The exterior of your home plays an important role; it protects your family from the elements and also offers people a first impression. A properly maintained exterior can increase the value of your property, as well as help you save energy through efficient insulation.

If you want to improve the exterior of your home, call Simpson Windows and Doors. We offer installation services for windows and doors in Barrie, Newmarket, and York. Our technicians produce customized products to help improve the exterior of your home according to your vision.

In all our glass windows and doors, we use Vertex3. This window technology adds strength and energy-efficiency to any of our glass products.

Call Today for New Windows and Doors
For information on new windows and doors in Barrie, visit our locations in Newmarket and Barrie. To get ideas of what we can do for you, see examples of our work at our Newmarket showroom or click through our online gallery.

***
Choose a Service That’s Right for You

If you need to improve your home’s look, choose Simpson Windows and Doors in Barrie. We offer you the following services: 
 Installation of new windows (bay, sliders, double hung)
 Replacement of existing glass with a variety of glass options
 Installation and replacement of customized doors for patios and gardens
 Full removal of frames
 Updates to shutters and window coverings
 New siding for doors

profile:
Your trusted source for quality windows, doors and garage doors for almost 30 years.

Beautiful & Affordable, Energy Efficient & High Performance. Kempenfelt Windows & Doors commitment to quality products and superior customer service is as strong today as it was when Robert Maslen first opened our doors over 25 years ago. This is just part of the reason Kempenfelt Windows & Doors has been voted Barrie's Favourite Window & Door Company 24 years running. 

At Kempenfelt Windows & Doors we provide our customers with a comprehensive list of products and services, from free in home estimate to custom installation, regardless of where you live in York Region. Our knowledgeable employees have decades of experience when it comes to finding and installing the right windows and doors for your home, guiding you every step of the way. We ensure that you receive the best product possible for the best price possible. We stand behind our products, service and installations, and our 25 year fully transferable comprehensive warranty means you can feel confident choosing Kempenfelt Windows & Doors for your next home renovation project. 

If you are a resident of York Region and are considering replacing your windows or doors, please contact our team for guidance. Call now to Book your free no obligation estimate.

The #1 windows and doors in the Toronto Area.
You’re looking for replacement windows that aren’t just beautiful and practical but are packed with innovative technology for maximum energy efficiency. 
This is your one-stop solution to beautiful windows and doors, professional installation, and responsive service at an exceptional price.

The Waysee Difference
Simple, FAST, and a worry-free experience backed by one of the best warranties in the area.

Trained Professionals.
Rigorously trained and selected to be effective, fast and polite during installation.

Wide Selection.

25 Year Warranty.

Fast and Responsive Customer Care
We respond to inquiries as fast as possible. Usually within minutes, sometimes seconds.

No Middleman.
No hidden fees and no delays. At Waysee, you get factory-priced windows and doors.

profile:
Our Vision Statement:
 
"To extend to our customers a service centred around good craftsmanship and care to details.
 
To create a culture centred around a more human approach to construction services.
 
To pursue mastery in customer service and craft by cultivating an open-minded, safe and inspiring work environment.
 
To challenge and refine the ever present ‘rough and fast’ attitude"
 
At Omnicraft we offer complete, quality residential window & door installations in the GTA.
 
•	Front doors
•	Casement windows
•	Single-hung windows
•	Sliders
•	Bay windows
•	Patio doors
•	And more…
 
(All sourced from manufacturers that mirror our values around craftsmanship and quality customer service.)
 
We provide all that comes along with creating a satisfying experience for you:
 
•	Demolition & disposal
•	Installation
•	Spray Insulation
•	Sealing
•	Trim carpentry
•	Masonary repairs
•	Drywall repairs
•	Rot repair & control
•	Etc.
name: Omnicraft

profile:
Now is the time to book that renovation project that you've been dreaming about. Maybe a new ensuite for your master bedroom? How would you like a brand new kitchen!? Are you thinking of selling and want to maximize your return?  Renovating the basement always helps to sell faster and for top dollar.  Make your renovation dreams come true. Quotes and advice are free! There is no better time than right now. The renovation business is getting busy,...but we still have openings for summer time projects.

If you want to update your home or just spruce it up for spring, call Epic Home Improvements now. Bathrooms are a specialty.  However, we are a full service company with over 20 years of experience.  How about a basement renovation, or brand new windows and doors,  We do decks; drywall; laminate, hardwood and tile flooring; tiles and much more.  

Give us a call, (905-954-1103) we will be happy to talk with you about your project.  Our normal service area includes Barrie, Bradford and Innisfil in the north to Richmond Hill; Stouffville and Markham in the south. And, from Keswick, Sutton or Beaverton in the east to Bond Head and New Tecumseth in the west.  We also work in Newmarket, Aurora, Markham and Maple. We will work in collaboration with you or your designer to ensure that you get the desired look and finish.

Find us on Houzz at http://www.houzz.com/pro/robert-graham2827/__public and at https://www.facebook.com/anepichomeimprovement/
products: Bathroom and Kitchen Renovations ; Basement Renovations ; Decks; Windows and Doors; and so much more.
diplomas: BA from University of Western Ontario
warranty_terms: 1 year on labour; manufacturer warranty on materials

profile: Estate Renovation Centre is a family owned business that has run from the heart of Newmarket for 36 years. Estate has become the leading source for York Region's windows, doors, siding, eavestrough, and soffit needs. The Benjamin Moore Signature store offers unparalleled free expert advice from Designers, Interior Decorators, and colour experts skilled in helping you choose the best and most fitting colours to make your house a home.
